attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: I am just desperate for tiktok to stay around

Absolutely disgraceful. I downloaded this application with the hopes of supporting our incredible president in our upcoming election but literal MINUTES after downloading a flurry of terrifying events occurred.
At first, I couldn‚Äôt figure my way around the app because the controls are garbage!! I couldn‚Äôt click on anything?? üò°
THEN my screen was slowly filled with some unfamiliar language??? I was told it was Chinese or Russian but I THOUGHT THIS APP WAS AMERICAN WHAT BLASPHEMY IS THIS???? 
Following the strange language my entire phone crashed and my information was sent to Chinese servers, resulting in a series of charges to my credit card I LOST HUNDREDS!!!
After this calamity I have no respect for this awful app and I hope it rots in hell!! Someone needs to get a priest to bless this unholy creation before it can be taken over by the devil and take our SOULS along with our private information!!!
